my 2nd function

```{r}
rescale <- function(x) {
 rng <-range(x)
 (x - rng[1]) / (rng[2] - rng[1]) 
}
```

```{r}
rescale2 <- function(x) {
 rng <-range(x, na.rm=TRUE)
 (x - rng[1]) / (rng[2] - rng[1]) 
}

rng
```

```{r}
rescale3 <- function(x, na.rm=TRUE, plot=FALSE) {
 if(na.rm) {
 rng <-range(x, na.rm=TRUE)
 } else {
 rng <-range(x)
 }
 print("Hello")
 answer <- (x - rng[1]) / (rng[2] - rng[1])
 
 print("is it me you are looking for?")
 
 if(plot) {
 plot(answer, typ="b", lwd=4)
 }
 print("I can see it in ...")
 return(answer)
}
```


```{r}
rescale3 <- function(x, na.rm=TRUE, plot=FALSE) {

 }

 return(answer)
```
